pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tapode nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro “sīsaṁ nahāyissāmī”ti tapodaṁ gantvā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.4: “yāvāyyā nahāyantī”ti ekamantaṁ paṭimānesi. Bhikkhū yāva samandhakārā nahāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vikāle sīsaṁ nahāyitvā, nagaradvāre thakite bahinagare vasitvā, kālasseva asambhinnena vilepanena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.7: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ bhagavā etadavoca—“kissa tvaṁ, mahārāja, kālasseva āgato asambhinnena vilepanenā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.8: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.9: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi. Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.11: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.14: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.18: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti, sedagatena gattena sayanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.4: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.7: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:2.8: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.4: “Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyāma, tena no phāsu hoti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.5: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na nahāyāma, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.7: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.9.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.10: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:3.11: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṁ katvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.2: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.7: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:4.8: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū addhānaṁ gantvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.2: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.7: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:5.8: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ajjhokāse cīvarakammaṁ karontā sarajena vātena okiṇṇā honti. Devo ca thokaṁ thokaṁ phusāyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.2: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti, kilinnena gattena sayanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.6: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.7.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:6.8: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā nahāyati, payoge payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.15: vassānassa paṭhamo māso “iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.17: yassa vinā nahānena na phāsu hoti. Gilānasamayoti nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: “addhayojanaṁ gacchissāmī”ti nahāyitabbaṁ, gacchantena nahāyitabbaṁ, gatena nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.23: bhikkhū sarajena vātena okiṇṇā honti, dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni kāye patitāni honti. “Vātavuṭṭhisamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.1: Ūnakaddhamāse ūnakasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.2: Ūnakaddhamāse vematiko, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.2.3: Ūnakaddhamāse atirekasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
